attributes.action: Anyone who has committed a sex offence should receive a life sentence.
attributes.additional_details: Because victims struggle with the trauma for their entire life.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Introduce mandatory life sentences for child sex offences
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/715556

Life imprisonment for rapists without release
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710049
